Agendas, Minutes and Packets
============================

City Council Agendas

Agendas are available prior to the regularly scheduled meeting online in the [Archive Center](https://www.cityofovilla.org/archive.asp "Archive Center").

[Most Recent](https://www.cityofovilla.org/Archive.asp?AMID=30&Type=Recent "Most Recent City Council Agenda") | [View All](https://www.cityofovilla.org/Archive.asp?AMID=30 "View All City Council Agenda Archive")

 City Council Minutes

The minutes from each City Council meeting are approved by the City Council at their next regularly scheduled meeting and will be posted at that time in the [Archive Center](https://www.cityofovilla.org/archive.asp "Archive Center").

[Most Recent](https://www.cityofovilla.org/Archive.asp?AMID=31&Type=Recent "Most Recent City Council Minutes") | [View All](https://www.cityofovilla.org/Archive.asp?AMID=31 "View All City Council Minutes Archive")

 City Council Packets

The Packets contain all information provided to the City Council in their packets for each meeting (except confidential information listed under the Executive Session).

Packet information is posted in the Archive Center.

[Most Recent l](https://www.cityofovilla.org/Archive.aspx?AMID=52&Type=Recent "Most Recent Packets")[View All](https://www.cityofovilla.org/Archive.aspx?AMID=52 "View All Packets")
